name: starter-2020
description: A homemade Expres, Objection, and TS React boilerplate

scripts.in:db: docker-compose exec db psql boiler_room root
scripts.migrate: docker-compose exec server npx knex migrate:latest
scripts.rollback: docker-compose exec server npx knex migrate:rollback
scripts.seed: docker-compose exec server npx knex seed:run
